page.title: 11INDUSTRY
page.content: {CAMFORD WAY INDUSTRIAL ESTATE} Camford Way is a modern development which has only been built 6 or 7 years. It can be located at grid reference 0426.There are between twenty and thirty units producing a wide variety of materials. Factory units range from 12,000 to 26,000 square feet.The average size of the workforce is about 40 whilst the total employed in the area of 3.05 acres is just over 700. Most of the small businesses moved to the site for one or more of the following reasons,usually from older unsuitable premises nearer the centre of the town due to better premises, access,expansion,competition. The manufacturing products of this area vary from precision machinery to the resurfacing of baths.Most employees are local.
